column9: in duncan. graveside services will be wednesday
column12: at 10:00 am at the duncan cemetery with the rev. gene reid officiating. arrangements are under the direction of the don grantham funeral home. iris was born on feb. 19
column15: england to george and ivey barrett. she married wendall lee dietrich on sept. 29
column17: in london. iris and wendall owned and operated dietrich flooring
column18: where she worked as a bookkeeper for many years. iris especially loved her pets. she is survived by her daughter
column19: diane ledford and husband tommy of duncan; one brother
column20: terry barrett of spain; one sister
column26: and kyndle ledford. she is also survived by many nieces and nephews whom she adored. she was preceded in death by her father
column29: ivey barrett; and her husband wendall lee dietrich. in lieu of flowers
column30: memorial donations can be made to the stephens county humane society
